BodyCopy.p: How many times have you as a captive board member, executive, or manager wished you had access to an insurance or risk management term? International Risk Management Institute, Inc. (IRMI), Captive.com’s owner, has developed an application for your Android or Apple device. The application is called Glossarisk. It provides definitions of more than 5,000 insurance terms, abbreviations, and acronyms.

One unique feature of the application enables you to submit a request for a definition for a term that is not currently in the glossary for addition to the glossary. The app also includes direct access to industry organizations’ websites for more information.
Curious? Go to the Glossarisk Web page to order your application. The price for a single copy is $4.99, and discounted prices are available for 10 or more.
